price: So We subjected to him the wind blowing gently by his command to wherever he wished,
arabic: فَسَخَّرۡنَا لَهُ ٱلرِّيحَ تَجۡرِي بِأَمۡرِهِۦ رُخَآءً حَيۡثُ أَصَابَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
